title: Bug 18163: Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace
description: When using the 'Add Import' feature with a selection that contains leading or trailing whitespace, nothing happens.
OB: When I use Ctrl+M (Add Import), nothing happens because of the trailing whitespace within the selection.
EB: I expected 'Node' to be added as an import, but instead, 'Node ' is added as an import because I made my selection by using 'Shift + Ctrl + Right'.
SR: The 'Add Import' feature should ignore leading and trailing whitespace in the selected text and add the correct import statement to the code.
